#summary Tutorial for using JPrIME-VMCMC.

*VMCMC has not yet been released, and the information below refers to a pre-release version. Feedback is much appreciated, should you want to try VMCMC out.*

= Introduction =

VMCMC is an application for analyzing output of MCMC chains. It deals with various metrics for assessing MCMC convergence, as well as summary statistics of inferred real-valued parameters, tree topologies, etc. VMCMC can be used with output from the C++ version of PrIME, and general tab-delimited files such as those produced by JPrIME applications [DLRS Delirious] or [DLTRS Deleterious].
